titlepage.titleproper: Guide to the Sozialistisches Büro Publications, 1969-1983
titlepage.publisher:
Department of Special Collections and University Archives
Stanford University Libraries
Stanford, California
titlepage.p: © 1999 The Board of Trustees of Stanford University. All rights reserved.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] Sozialistisches Büro Publications, M0914, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: West German protest group which published the left wing journal "Links - Sozialistische Zeitung" as well as numerous pamphlets, handouts, and propaganda leaflets.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: 240 volumes arranged by subject and date, as well as about 300 pieces of ephemera arranged by date.

Widersprüche - Zeitschrift for sozialistische Politik im Bildungs-, Gesundheits- und Sozialbereich

odd.p: The journal Widersprüche is still being published by Verlag 2000 GmbH, Offenbach. Later issues are not part of this collection. The series is not closed, however.
